summary: Sum 41 is a popular Canadian rock band from Ajax, Ontario, formed in 1996. The band consists of five members and has released several successful albums, including "All Killer No Filler" and "Does This Look Infected?". Their songs, like "Fat Lip" and "Still Waiting", have topped charts and been certified platinum. Sum 41 has won multiple awards, been nominated for a Grammy, and is one of Canada's best-selling artists. They're known for their energetic live performances and extensive global tours. In 2023, they announced their eighth album, "Heaven :x: Hell", would be their last before disbanding.
title: Sum 41
